item.description:
Eileen Jerome, co-owner of Jerome's Party Plus & Taylor Rental in Westfield, MA, will take you step by step to crafting and perfecting the opening sentence that will grab the listener's attention and will make them want to know more about you and your business.

An elevator speech remains one of the most important networking and marketing tools you have at your disposal.

Eileen is well aware that the members of WBOA already have clever and punchy elevator speeches, but it might be time to tweak, update, and refresh the WOW factor that sets you apart from your competition.
item.why: Learn the skill that every business person needs. THE ELEVATOR SPEECH. Together we will learn to create it, rehearse it, and tailor it for a specific audience.
item.name: April Breakfast Meeting- MAKE A LASTING FIRST IMPRESSION
